results.title: Treatment with simvastatin inhibits the formation of abdominal aortic aneurysms in rabbits.
results.text_hl: Immunoreactivity of tissue inhibitor 1 of MMPs was not statistically different among groups II, III, and IV. CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may prove clinically significant in suppressing the development and expansion of @<m>DISEASE_Achalasia_Addisonianism_Alacrimia_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536008 @@@AAAs@@@ and, thereby, in reducing the risk of @DISEASE_Rupture @DISEASE_MESH:D012421 @@@rupture@@@ and the need for repair.

citations.NLM: Mastoraki ST, Toumpoulis IK, Anagnostopoulos CE, Tiniakos D, Papalois A, Chamogeorgakis TP, Angouras DC, Rokkas CK. Treatment with simvastatin inhibits the formation of abdominal aortic aneurysms in rabbits. Ann Vasc Surg. 2012 Feb;26(2):250-8. PMID: 22222170
